lines.text: There's an exceptional view of the city.
The bedroom suite is this way.
Wait. Martin, you've known me for a long time.
When you were very little, you wanted to marry me so that you could always have chocolate pudding.
At my first ball, it was you who fastened my dress when it came undone.
Such memories belong to another lifetime, mademoiselle. One which has come to an end. And which, unfortunately, some of us have outlived.
But why have our lifetimes come to an end, our private little worlds?
There is something you and/or the German army can do. Nevermind, I'm sure it's punishable by death.
Being safe isn't nearly as important in this world as it used to be.
